txt.en: Return to Céolstan at the Harwick Stables
Céolstan can be found within Harwick's stables.\n\nYou should speak with Céolstan of the draugar in Dwolung Hole.

Draugar have begun to spill from the mouth of a cave near the spot where the salamanders show signs of corruption. The dead should be slain anew, for it is a bad sign when those who have passed walk the earth once more.

'Draugar walk in Dwolung Hole? It cannot be... that cave has been quiet for as long as I can remember; I used to play there as a boy. No creature save the living ever stirred in that tomb! \n\n'I hope your valiant effort against the draugar put a stop to the spread of their corruption. I shall record this in my next report to Harding, for we will need to keep a close watch on Dwolung Hole now.'

Draugar have begun to spill from the mouth of a cave near the spot where the salamanders show signs of corruption. The dead should be slain anew, for it is a bad sign when those who have passed walk the earth once more.
Draugar have begun to spill from the mouth of a cave near the spot where the salamanders show signs of corruption.

Dwolung Hole can be found in the bog west of Harwick where the salamanders grow corrupted.\n\nYou should defeat the Draugar who begin to spill from the mouth of Dwolung Hole, spreading the pollution of death to the living.
